channel.title: CVE Feed for 3S-Smart -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for 3S-Smart -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-10612|2024-09-17T02:32:49.885Z -- 3s-smart -- 3s-smart%20software%20solutions%20gmbh%20codesys%20control%20v3%20products%20prior%20to%20version%203.5.14.0
item.description: In 3S-Smart Software Solutions GmbH CODESYS Control V3 products prior to version 3.5.14.0, user access management and communication encryption is not enabled by default, which could allow an attacker access to the device and sensitive information, including user credentials.
